segments.text: I used to think that Americans had so much money they didn ’ t know what to do with it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . But now I ’ Ve learned differently . Now I have a more realistic opinion .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are lots of jobs , and almost everybody works . There is a high standard of living . People earn a lot , but they spend a lot to live . So there isn ’ t so much money after all .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I still say Americans spend a lot more money on useless things than we Chinese do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s true . But Americans work hard for their money like we do . I don ’ t know why our spending habits are so different .
segments.speaker: S1
